title: Шрīла Бгакті Ракшак Шрīдгар Дев-Ґосва̄мī Маха̄ра̄дж
author: Шрīла Бгакті Сундар Ґовінда Дев-Ґосва̄мī Маха̄ра̄дж

translation: “I fall at the feet of Śrīla Śrīdhar-Deva,<br class="SongVerse__break" />who with charming expression sings his songs of sweet nectar.<br class="SongVerse__break" />Dressed with fine garments like sun newly-risen,<br class="SongVerse__break" />he’s the true saint the devotees have chosen.<br class="SongVerse__break" />His detachment and knowledge are just like an ocean,<br class="SongVerse__break" />the treasure-house of complete, perfect conclusion.<br class="SongVerse__break" />Radiant in Pastimes of loving devotion,<br class="SongVerse__break" />the abode of pure ecstasy, bestower of good fortune;<br class="SongVerse__break" />foremost true follower of Śrīla Bhakti Siddhānta,<br class="SongVerse__break" />foremost great general of the whole renounced order,<br class="SongVerse__break" />my lord and my master, my only shelter,<br class="SongVerse__break" />I worship his feet, Śrīla Śrīdhar-Deva.”
